title: frankbitcoin
author: frankbitcoin
content: Not sure one of these has sold on here yet so I'll start us out with an auctionThe Times January 2019 10-Year Anniversary to Bitcoin NewspaperTruly awesome condition (please see pictures)Auction Ends:  Tuesday June 21st at 7 PM ESTStarting Bid:  .05BTCBid Increments:  .001BTCSniping:  No.  If a bid is made in the last ten minutes of the auction, the auction will extend an additional ten minutes from that persons bid until no further bid has been made for a full ten minutes.Shipping:  $25 USPS Priority, signature required for delivery.  Will be packaged flat, secured with cardboard and bubble wrapped.  Package will also be insured.Pics:Front -https://imgur.com/a/5fvLDcRBack -https://imgur.com/a/9g2EQl8

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Don't you think $1,000 is a bit steep for an advertisement in a newspaper?

comments.author: frankbitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: M-BTC on June 15, 2022, 08:58:46 AMDon't you think $1,000 is a bit steep for an advertisement in a newspaper?No clue, honestly; will let the market determine.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: M-BTC on June 15, 2022, 08:58:46 AMDon't you think $1,000 is a bit steep for an advertisement in a newspaper?Its an interesting newspaper, its a commemorative piece marking the 10 years of Bitcoin,the market will decide on a value, I havent seen one for sale yet.Quote from: frankbitcoin on June 16, 2022, 06:07:34 AMQuote from: M-BTC on June 15, 2022, 08:58:46 AMDon't you think $1,000 is a bit steep for an advertisement in a newspaper?No clue, honestly; will let the market determine.It might be worth drastically reducing the start price and have a reserve price too,let people bid with what they are comfortable with when the auction is over you willhave a clearer picture of what you can get.
